subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Foul play was probably not a factor in the death of Southern California place-kicker Mario Danelo, whose body was found about 120 feet down a rocky cliff, the police said Sunday.
snippet: Foul play was probably not a factor in the death of Southern California place-kicker Mario Danelo, whose body was found about 120 feet down a rocky cliff, the police said Sunday.
